isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL TANDEM AXLE FORWARD REAR DRIVE UNITS - REMOVE - MAIN DIFFERENTIAL CASE AND RING GEAR ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: MAIN DIFFERENTIAL CASE AND RING GEAR ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Position the carrier so that the ring gear is toward you.
Use a punch and a hammer to mark the position of the bearing caps on the legs of the differential carrier ( Figure 27).

figure.caption: Figure 27. Mark Position of Bearing Caps on Differential Carrier Legs

step1.para: If lock pins are used on the adjusting rings, use a hammer and a drift to remove the lock pins ( Figure 27).
If cotter pins are used on the adjusting rings, remove the cotter pins.

caution.para: Do not hit the adjusting ring with a hammer. Do not use a hammer and a drift to loosen the adjusting rings. These methods damage the adjusting rings.

step1.para: Use a "T"-bar wrench or equivalent tool to loosen the adjusting rings ( Figure 28).
Remove the bolts and the washers that fasten the bearing caps to the differential carrier. Mark the bearing caps and the carrier to make sure the caps are correctly installed at assembly.

note.para: Each bearing cap must be installed on the carrier leg from which it was removed. The caps are matched to the carrier legs. DO NOT MIX BEARING CAPS ON CARRIER LEGS.

step1.para: Remove the bearing caps, the adjusting rings and the bearing cups from the differential carrier ( Figure 29).

figure.caption: Figure 29. Remove Bearing Caps, Adjusting Rings, and Bearing Cups

step1.para: Use a lifting sling to remove the main differential case and ring gear assembly from the carrier ( Figure 30).

figure.caption: Figure 30. Remove Main Differential Case and Ring Gear Assembly

note.para: If either the bearing cup or the cone needs to be replaced, both parts must be replaced in a matched set.

step1.para: If the bearing cones on the main differential case need to be replaced, use a bearing puller to remove the cones ( Figure 31).

figure.caption: Figure 31. Use Bearing Puller to Remove Cones

note.para: The bearing cones are not interchangeable.
